item.title: Five things Trump should know about Liberia and why they speak 'good English'
item.description: Liberia was founded by freed slaves and the country has long-standing historical ties with the US.

item.title: Children queuing for supplements killed in Israeli strike in Gaza, hospital says
item.description: Eight children were among 15 people reportedly killed while queuing outside a clinic in the central town of Deir al-Balah.

item.title: EU chief von der Leyen survives rare confidence vote
item.description: The outcome of the vote was not a surprise - but the fact it came about at all was not a positive signal for von der Leyen.

item.title: US cuts visa validity for applicants from three African countries
item.description: The United States announces sweeping changes to its non-immigrant visa policy for Cameroon, Ethiopia and Nigeria.

item.title: Brazil vows to match US tariffs after Trump threatens 50% levy
item.description: Trump's threat is over what he calls the "mistreatment" of his ally, ex-President Jair Bolsonaro.
